description: This mojito smoothie is packed with the zingy flavor combination of mint and lime, while rich and creamy thanks to smooth blended bananas and hemp seeds.
name: Creamy Hemp Mojito Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 1 cup unflavored soy or almond milk

recipeInstructions.text: Place bananas in blender and blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides as needed.
Add mint, hemp seeds, lime juice, zest and vanilla extract. Pulse a few times to break everything up and blend.
Add milk and blend until smooth.
